parameters.name: IstioVersion
parameters.description: The version of Istio used by the ASM instance.

parameters.name: Kind
parameters.description:
The type of Istio resource whose common YAML templates you want to query. Valid values:

*   AuthorizationPolicy
*   RequestAuthentication
*   PeerAuthentication
*   WorkloadGroup
*   WorkloadEntry
*   Sidecar
*   EnvoyFilter
*   ServiceEntry
*   Gateway
*   DestinationRule
*   VirtualService
